text:
Truth is, if the bridge was built by a black construction company, those incompetency & anti-BEE tweets would be on blast!
#BridgeCollapse
#BridgeCollapse -that we the company won't have shares dropping everywhere!
South Africa: One Dies in Sandton Bridge Collapse: [News24Wire] At least one person has died… http://goo.gl/fb/NiaEiU
#BridgeCollapse? Expect a really huge humble apology and let the engineer go and the one passed the inspection on the bridge-#Accountability
